titleStmt.title: Gods vvisdom justified, and mans folly condemned, touching all maner of outward providential administrations, in a sermon / preached before the Honorable House of Commons, Ian. 31. 1648. By John Cardell.
titleStmt.author: Cardell, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Henry Cripps, and are to be sold in Popes-head-Alley,
